meanings.definition: In a manner related to hydroponics.
meanings.sent1: The plants grew hydroponically in the nutrient-rich water.
meanings.sent2: The farmer tended to his crops hydroponically, without soil.
meanings.sent3: The fish swam hydroponically in the tank, enjoying their aquatic environment.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the plants reached out hydroponically, seeking sustenance.
meanings.sent5: The greenhouse was filled with plants growing hydroponically, a marvel of modern agriculture.

meanings.sent1: The hydroponically grown lettuce was fresh and crisp.
meanings.sent2: The hydroponically cultivated tomatoes were juicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The hydroponically raised fish were the talk of the town, swimming in their special tanks.
meanings.sent4: The hydroponically nurtured flowers bloomed brightly, a testament to innovative farming.
meanings.sent5: The hydroponically managed garden was a sight to behold, showcasing sustainable agriculture methods.
